field.output: This tool is designed to simplify your system application upgrade assessment. with tool, you can select the files which contains the sensitive/protected data as business files then remove those data. then you can make a db dump from this db with full schema bu no any sensitive/protected data, and provide to HP LAB to do initial assessment upgrade for your system. And with this tool, compared with unload scripts, it will remove all the data of the business files more efficiently.

And with this tool, compared with unload scripts, it will remove all the data of the business files more efficiently.
